incidents.title: Google's YouTube Kids App Presents Inappropriate Content
incidents.description: YouTube's content filtering and recommendation algorithms exposed children to disturbing and inappropriate videos.

incidents.title: Uber AV Killed Pedestrian in Arizona
incidents.description: An Uber autonomous vehicle (AV) in autonomous mode struck and killed a pedestrian in Tempe, Arizona.

incidents.title: Collection of Robotic Surgery Malfunctions
incidents.description: Study on database reports of robotic surgery malfunctions (8,061), including those ending in injury (1,391) and death (144), between 2000 and 2013.

incidents.title: TayBot
incidents.description: Microsoft's Tay, an artificially intelligent chatbot, was released on March 23, 2016 and removed within 24 hours due to multiple racist, sexist, and anit-semitic tweets generated by the bot.

incidents.title: Wikipedia Vandalism Prevention Bot Loop
incidents.description: Wikipedia bots meant to remove vandalism clash with each other and form feedback loops of repetitve undoing of the other bot's edits.

incidents.title: Common Biases of Vector Embeddings
incidents.description: Researchers from Boston University and Microsoft Research, New England demonstrated gender bias in the most common techniques used to embed words for natural language processing (NLP).

incidents.title: Amazon Censors Gay Books
incidents.description: Amazon's book store 'cataloging error' led to books containing gay and lesbian themes to lose their sales ranking, therefore losing visibility on the sales platform.

incidents.title: Gender Biases of Google Image Search
incidents.description: Google Image returns results that under-represent women in leadership roles, notably with the first photo of a female 'CEO' being a Barbie doll after 11 rows of male CEOs.

incidents.title: Las Vegas Self-Driving Bus Involved in Accident
incidents.description: A self-driving public shuttle by Keolis North America and Navya was involved in a collision with a human-driven delivery truck in Las Vegas, Nevada on its first day of service.

reports.title: Google's YouTube Kids App Criticized for 'Inappropriate Content'
reports.description: Child and consumer advocacy groups complained to the FTC that Google's new YouTube Kids app contains "inappropriate content," including explicit sexual language and jokes about pedophilia.

reports.title: Driverless shuttle bus crashes less than two hours after Las Vegas launch
reports.description: The crash, apparently caused by human error, came during the shuttle's first day in operation.

reports.title: Self-Driving Uber Car Kills Pedestrian in Arizona, Where Robots Roam
reports.description: A woman in Tempe, Ariz., died after being hit by a self-driving car operated by Uber, in what is believed to be the first fatality of a pedestrian from an autonomous vehicle on public roads.
